# Security Policy

## Reporting a Vulnerability

**DO NOT** create a public GitHub issue for security vulnerabilities.

Report to: **blackroad.systems@gmail.com**

Include: description, reproduction steps, affected versions, and impact.

We will respond within 48 hours.

## Supported Versions

| Version | Supported |
|---------|-----------|
| Latest  | ✅ |
| < Latest | ❌ |

## More Info

See the [BlackRoad Security Policy](https://github.com/BlackRoad-OS/blackroad/blob/main/SECURITY.md).
